name: Authority to amend
text:
PART IX.  AMENDMENT OF ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BYLAWS
 
     [§414D-181]  Authority to amend.  A corporation may amend its articles of incorporation at any time to add or change a provision that is required or permitted in the articles or to delete a provision not required in the articles.  Whether a provision is required or permitted in the articles is determined as of the effective date of the amendment. [L 2001, c 105, pt of §1]
